name: Interstellar Defence
description:
Defend your planet from waves and waves of UFO's by... typing! Utilize your radar beam against hordes of hostile invaders, and survive for as long as possible!

[Developer Notes]

Hey folks!  This game was made for Weekly Game Jam #81, the fourth game jam I've done so far! I'm quite proud of myself on this one, as essentially all content was produced by myself. I would have liked to implement some music, but I was running out of time after I finished all of the polishing features, and didn't want to strain myself working all day long. I won't be able to publish a WebGL version of this game, as it always seems to crash with memory bugs. Updates may come out in the future, but only time will tell. Well, that's all today! I hope to see all of you in the next game jam!
